dtliExcerpt: Audiences may feel the same way after seeing this work of theatrical virtuosity, realizing that all the tiny details, wild rhythms, and clever hooks presented on stage have added up to a work that is brave, purposeful, and rich.
bwwExcerpt: Audiences may feel the same way after seeing this work of theatrical virtuosity, realizing that all the tiny details, wild rhythms, and clever hooks presented on stage have added up to a work that is brave, purposeful, and rich.

keyPhrases.quote: emotionally stunned and still with the realization that they have just heard something truly great

llmScore.reasoning: The reviewer uses exceptionally strong praise ('theatrical virtuosity', 'truly great', 'brave, purposeful, and rich') and creates an elaborate metaphor comparing the audience's experience to the band's awestruck reaction to their own masterpiece.

showScoreExcerpt: "the play turns into something altogether fresh and, in this play-with-music hybrid form"
